about.text: Welcome to my humble 'portfolio' or rather just a small showcase of some of my work. I'm mostly a web developer (HTML/CSS/JS/PHP) but I also do video editing, music and design. If you'd like to hire me for a job or want to see some more examples/references, contacts are at the bottom of the page.

axette.title: Axette
axette.body: Very simple and lightweight AJAX library for Nette Framework.

anxietySimulator.title: Anxiety Simulator
anxietySimulator.body: Simulation game of various anxiety disorders made in Phaser. Source code available on GitHub.

starterpack.title: Starterpack
starterpack.body: Starter template for Nette projects with custom CMS. Live preview

matecak.title: Matečák Soundboard
matecak.body: Soundboard of the (in)famous Czech video Matečák, with built-in beat machine. Source code available on GitHub.

globalCollapse.title: Global Collapse: Pandemic
globalCollapse.body: Browser-based MMORPG made in PHP with Nette. Source code available on GitHub.

protez.title: DC Protěž
protez.body: Website and custom-made CMS for a volunteer and community center in Prague.

skolka.title: Školička Grébovka
skolka.body: Školička Grébovka is a children's group for preschool children two years and older.

noblesManor.title: Nobles Manor Apartments
noblesManor.body: Booking website for Nobles Manor under the Castle apartments in the Lesser Town of Prague.

burner.title: Burner
burner.body: Service for creating self-destructing messages, inspired by Privnote.

magicWars.title: Magic Wars Demo (15.3 MB)
magicWars.body: A single player card game for Windows. Demo contains three decks and enemies. Project inactive for several years now. More info (CZ only)

feedTheFlames.title: Feed the Flames
feedTheFlames.body: Simple HTML5/JavaScript game concept made with CraftyJS. View source code on GitHub.

destruction.title: Symphony of Destruction
destruction.body: A simple relaxation website from back in the day. Requires enabled autoplay on videos to fully work.

faucet.title: Matronator's Bitcoin Faucet
faucet.body: One of the highest paying bitcoin faucet on FaucetSystem.com (CryptoBara).
